title: Seeding Cardano's Grassroots DeFi
description: How to encourage new teams to Deploy Defi Solutions on Cardano?
importance: So that new teams can have a kickstart in their projects without having to resort to ICOs and VCs  allocation.
success: At least 4 new teams deploying DeFi dapps on Cardano in 2022 + Managing to form a community in order to gain competitiveness/susteinability
